H0.text: What is the main attraction at Taronga Park, Sydney. Aquarium

H1.text: What is the main attraction at Taronga Park, Sydney. Botanical Garden

H2.text: What is the main attraction at Taronga Park, Sydney. Wildlife Sanctuary

H3.text: What is the main attraction at Taronga Park, Sydney. ZOO

A4.text: Taronga Zoo Sydney is a government-run public zoo located in Sydney, New South Wales, Australia, in the Lower North Shore suburb of Mosman, on the shores of Sydney Harbour. It offers great views of Sydney Harbour and the city.

A5.text: Divided into various zoogeographic regions, the 28-hectare (69-acre) Taronga Zoo Sydney is home to more than 5,000 animals of approximately 350 different species.
